snippet.title: Bombarium
snippet.description:
🎮 Play on:
https://akimi-games.itch.io/bombarium
https://gamejolt.com/games/bombarium/518025

Bombarium is fast-paced action arcade multiplayer game for 2-4 players in deathmatch mode or one player vs monsters in singleplayer mode on several unique battlegrounds.
